Text: You need to change the name to S02E02, it looks like it is episode 1.

@TorrentGuy96: Media player classic. Unlike Uocjat, I can't play it on WMP modern at all. It's not a big deal, MPC lets me set an audio offset. But in general you can expect a lot of folks to be using MPC, cause it's what CCCP installs.
